Articles.Content: Hey guys! Working on Episode 3 of my KSP cinematic series and I need to know the location of the dead Kracken on... bop? Or is it Gilly? anyway if you guys could tell me where it is at so I can get an orbit to fly over head that would be great!

It is on bop, not Gilly, and somewhere around the equator. That's all I know about it.

Silly youtube?..

Edited January 23, 2014 by TechnicalK3rbal

It is on bop, not Gilly, and somewhere around the equator. That's all I know about it.

Yes, it is on Bop but not near the equator. It is close to the north pole. For exact coordinates check http://www.kerbalmaps.com/
